description: This file defines an interface IEventHandler with virtual methods for handling various OCI container events, used within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface with callback methods for handling OCI container events: start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container is started, with container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container is stopped, with container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container fails, with container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Handles changes in OCI container state, with container name and event data.
